newsitem.title: BULGARIA: ONLY TREASURY PAPER TRADES ON BULGARIA BOURSE.
newsitem.headline: ONLY TREASURY PAPER TRADES ON BULGARIA BOURSE.

text.p: No corporate stocks traded on the Sofia Stock Exchange (SSE) for a fifteenth day in a row and the RABSI (Reuter All Bulgaria Stock Index) was unchanged from Thursday's 41.31 points, brokers said.
One repo deal in treasury paper worth of 710,175 levs was struck on the SSE. There were no repo deals on that exchange on Thursday, said traders.
The other local bourse, the Bulgarian Stock Exchange (BSE) has been in a summer recess since August 5 and will resume trading on September 2. -- Sofia Newsroom, (++359-2) 981 8569
